title: Full Stack Developer | Laravel & Vue.js
Summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with experience in Laravel and Vue.js. Skilled in building web and mobile applications, integrating databases, and working with modern frameworks. Currently studying Web & Mobile Development at SoliCode Tanger.
About: I'm Douae Zoubair, a full-stack developer passionate about building scalable web apps, e-commerce platforms, and dashboards using Laravel and Vue.js. I focus on clean code, user-friendly interfaces, and efficient database management. I love solving problems, automating tasks, and creating impactful software. I'm always learning and experimenting with new tech to push boundaries and deliver meaningful solutions.I tried to keep it simple and concise.
